section.title: Example Code
section.para: This section provides examples illustrating the basic usage of the client interfaces supported by the RLS. Using the client API, developers may create client applications that interact with the RLS server to perform replica location operations.
Client applications developed in C must do both of the following:

listitem.simpara: Include the client header file at $GLOBUS_LOCATION/include/globus_rls_client.h.
Link to the client shared library at $GLOBUS_LOCATION/lib/libglobus_rls_client_gcc32dbgpthr.

section.para: For C language example code, click here.
